listitem.para: HELP has two forms: with and without a keyword input. When no keyword is given, MSWLogo will open the Windows help for MWSLogo to the table of contents. When a keyword is given, MSWLogo will search the Windows help for the section on keyword. You may enter the full keyword or a partial keyword.

programlisting.userinput: HELP "introduction ; open to the "introduction" section HELP "erase ; open the description of the ERASE command
